name: Pushin' Boxes
description:
Play as a little robot (named プシン) as it pushes boxes around inside a warehouse to organized them.

It features 16 levels of puzzling box-pushin' action.

How to play Move W A S D or Arrow Keys
Select Level
Left Mouse Button or
1-8 Keys + Shift Key for levels 9-16
Reload Level
R
Undo Movement
U Exit to Level Selection L Exit to Title
Esc Continue to Next Level/Screen
Space Meta

Pushin' Boxes is a Sokoban clone made with Rust and ggez.

Created by septum.

Read more about the release of my first game!
